definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: The garden was planted with Chinese roses.
A preliminary study on change patterns of ethylene production during flower opening and senescence in cut roses (Chinese with English Abstract).
sentences.chinese: 月季切花开花和衰老进程中乙烯变化类型初探。

sentences.english: The delicate and charming China rose in the tomb garden.
sentences.chinese: 在阴霾天空下，陵园里分外妖娆娇艳的月季。

sentences.english: The article reports the physicochemical properties and the conditions of extracting the Monthly Rose red pigment.
sentences.chinese: 研究了月季花红色素的提取条件及理化性质。

sentences.english: Then I put a slip of Chinese rose into the glass.
sentences.chinese: 然后我在杯中插入了一支月季花。

sentences.english: Finally, he stopped at a Chinese rose flower.
sentences.chinese: 终于，他在一株月季花前停了下来。

sentences.english: Rose, originating from China, plays an important role in international trade.
sentences.chinese: 月季原产于中国，在国际贸易中占重要地位。

sentences.english: The study aimed to provide theoretical basis for breeding Chinese roses varieties with disease resistance.
sentences.chinese: 为选育月季抗病品种提供理论依据。

sentences.english: After pruning, feed plants with a rose fertiliser.
sentences.chinese: 修剪完成后施用月季花肥。

sentences.english: If required, the addition of proprietary rose food or bone meal, into the base of the hole, should be done now.
sentences.chinese: 另外须在栽植坑的底部放一些月季专用肥料或骨粉。

sentences.english: Plant your rose in the centre of the box at normal planting depth.
sentences.chinese: 然后按照普通的种植深度把你的月季栽植在盒子中心。

sentences.english: I used to think Chinese rose Nothing to see here, so it moved to the corner.
sentences.chinese: 以前我觉得月季花没什么好看的，所以把它移到墙角。

sentences.english: A month later, as many as Chinese rose so much.
sentences.chinese: 一个月后，竟然有月季花那么大。
忘记了叫什么花，月季红？

sentences.english: Rose is rose, even though a more beautiful, also may not is a rose.
sentences.chinese: 月季就是月季，即使开得再艳丽，也不可能是玫瑰。

sentences.english: Rose is rose, even though a more beautiful, also may not is a rose.
sentences.chinese: 月季就是月季，即使开得再艳丽，也不可能是玫瑰。
